Instruction: Spray a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray.

Combine the flour, butter, pecans, and 1/4 cup of confectioners' sugar in a bowl and mash until fully mixed and a soft dough forms. Take about 2 teaspoons of dough for each cookie and roll into 3/4-inch balls. Arrange the balls on ungreased cookie sheets.
Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring them to wire racks to cool completely.
Allow the cookies to cool completely before rolling them in the remaining confectioners' sugar.
